entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
